explains: v. 容忍；居住；接受（规则、劝告等）；（感情）始终不渝（abide 的现在分词）
adj. 持久的；始终不渝的
wordGroup: abide by 遵守；信守；承担…的后果
abide by the law 遵守法律
abide by the contract 遵守合同

sentences.en: He has a genuine and abiding love of the craft.
sentences.cn: 他对这门手艺有着一种发自内心和持久不变的热爱。

sentences.en: By and large, these people are peace-loving, law-abiding citizens.
sentences.cn: 这些人总的来说都是热爱和平，遵纪守法的公民。

sentences.en: We believe that the law should protect decent law-abiding citizens and their property.
sentences.cn: 我们相信法律会保护正派守法的公民及其财产。
